titles.title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the founding of the California League of Food Processors and congratulating the members and officers of the California League of Food Processors for its achievements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 1/25/2005--Introduced. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the founding of the California League of Food Processors and acknowledges League efforts to provide wholesome and affordable processed fruits and vegetables to the people of California, the United States, and the world.
